lines.text:
[to Van Helsing]
In the days to come, you will pray for death... release...

[to Van Helsing]
My revenge has spread over centuries and has just begun!

[Urbanely to D.D. Denham, to hide that he is onto something]
What are you going to do with me? You can't let me go, can you? I know too much. Do you mind if I smoke? It's a bad habit, I know, but it helps me to concentrate.

[to Van Helsing, as D.D. Denham]
You are an interfering man, Professor. Do not meddle, or you will have to deal with me.
At this, the Sabbath of the Undead, I call upon you to witness my supreme triumph.
